name: Orbital Trip
description:
Description :

In Orbital Trip, you play as a spaceship who intercept a strange signal... Travel from planet to planet accross multiple solar systems and discover the source of that signal !

This game was originally made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 47.

Controls :

  • Z or W : Move faster around the planet
  • S : Move slower around the planet
  • Left-click : Move to the selected planet
  • Space bar : Continue the dialog
  • Mouse scrollwheel : Zoom in and out
  • Escape : Go back to the menu

The game is also gamepad compatible

Team :

  • Mastoast
  • Cyril "Effarek" Rastel
  • Guillaume "Volothamp" Russo

Credits :

  • Font used :  
    • Arcade Classic by Jakob Fischer
    • Retro Gaming by Daymarius

Every other asset is self-made.

Patch 1.1 - 2020/10/07

 - Fix text boxes
 - Simplified some levels to reduce useless waiting time
 - Add a buffer for the orbit change input
 - Slightly improve the ending
